    • Method Detail

      • onBeforeValidateBalance

        public void onBeforeValidateBalance(Transfer transfer)
                             throws ExternalException
        Description copied from interface: TransferListener
        Callback method invoked before validating the balance of involved accounts, in order to perform a payment. Any DB writes done within this method will be either committed or rolled back according to the original transaction. Throwing an exception will rollback the original transaction. To be notified whether the original transaction was committed or rolled back, use CurrentTransactionData.addTransactionCommitListener(nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.transaction.TransactionCommitListener) and CurrentTransactionData.addTransactionRollbackListener(nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.transaction.TransactionRollbackListener), respectively.
        Specified by:
        onBeforeValidateBalance in interface TransferListener
        Throws:
        ExternalException - When an error message should be displayed to the user explaining the error, this exception type should be thrown

      • onTransferInserted

        public void onTransferInserted(Transfer transfer)
                        throws ExternalException
        Description copied from interface: TransferListener
        Callback method invoked on the same DB transaction of the payment, after the transfer is inserted, but before committing the transaction. Any DB writes done within this method will be either committed or rolled back according to the original transaction. Throwing an exception will rollback the original transaction. To be notified whether the original transaction was committed or rolled back, use CurrentTransactionData.addTransactionCommitListener(nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.transaction.TransactionCommitListener) and CurrentTransactionData.addTransactionRollbackListener(nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.transaction.TransactionRollbackListener), respectively.
        Specified by:
        onTransferInserted in interface TransferListener
        Throws:
        ExternalException - When an error message should be displayed to the user explaining the error, this exception type should be thrown

      • onTransferProcessed

        public void onTransferProcessed(Transfer transfer)
        Description copied from interface: TransferListener
        Callback method invoked when a transfer is processed: performed when no authorization is used, when the transfer is authorized or an installment is processed. This method is invoked after the main DB transaction has been committed - no matter what this method does, the transfer is already persisted and won't be affected. Any exceptions thrown will just be logged on the server. If the TransferListener.onTransferInserted(Transfer) or TransferListener.onBeforeValidateBalance(Transfer) methods are implemented, and this notification is needed in order to notify that the transfer is affectively processed, either TransferListener.onBeforeValidateBalance(Transfer) or TransferListener.onTransferInserted(Transfer) can set the Transfer.setTraceNumber(String) with some external identifier, in order to acknowledge the processing of the specific transfer.
        Specified by:
        onTransferProcessed in interface TransferListener
